entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 overnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High 14. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
